overview: Yudho (Ray Sahetapy) is a film producer who always screwed up. He ask Sabrina (Nessa Sadin), a gothic writer to write a horror script for him.  Sabrina is trying to write the script at Villa Kubang, which is known as a hunted place, in order to get the scary moments. Back then in Villa Kubang, 5 teenagers had died while performing Jelangkung (weegee board game).
title: The Wall
